synaptree.config.title: SynapTree
synaptree.config.colors.directory: Color for directory nodes. Default is Blue (#0088ff).
synaptree.config.colors.defaultFile: Fallback color for file nodes. Used when no extension mapping matches. Default is Gray (#aaaaaa).
synaptree.config.colors.extensions: Mapping of file extensions to specific colors. Use this to highlight important assets.
synaptree.config.visuals.activeColor: Highlight color for links when active or hovered.
synaptree.config.visuals.normalOpacity: Opacity of links in their normal state (0.0 to 1.0).
synaptree.config.visuals.particleSpeed: Speed of the signal particles flowing through the graph.
synaptree.config.general.language: Display language. 'auto' follows VS Code locale.
synaptree.config.general.ignorePatterns: Glob patterns to exclude files/folders from the graph (e.g. node_modules, .git).
